= Introduction =

This page describes the dependencies required to develop the python-poker-engine.


= Essentials =

We are targeting [http://www.python.org/download/releases/2.5/ Python 2.5].  

This project follows the concepts of [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Test_driven_development test driven development].  We use [http://ivory.idyll.org/articles/nose-intro.html Nose] for [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Unit_test unit testing].  

= Client Development =

We plan on using [http://www.pyglet.org/ pyglet] for a graphical poker client.

We have yet to decide on a networking architecture or API.  We are evaluating the use of [http://wiki.secondlife.com/wiki/Eventlet Eventlet] or [http://twistedmatrix.com/trac/ Twisted].
